Inside the cell
?


On this page, intercellular stats of the most fecundant cell are displayed. This is mostly useful to see what concentrations of molecules your Virtual Microbes observe, and if/how this determines the expression of proteins.

Drag to zoom, and double-click to zoom out. Use the input field in the bottom-left to set a rolling average.

Extra clarification for some of the stats displayed on this page
Production timecourse shows the concentration of biomass
Gross production timecourse shows how much biomass is generated

Most fecundant

Oldest cell
